The Speaker of Canada's House of Commons has resigned after inviting a Ukrainian man who fought for a Nazi unit to Parliament and praising him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: That public recognition has caused pain to individuals and communities, including the Jewish community in Canada and around the world, in addition to survivors of Nazi atrocities in Poland, among other nations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: I accept full responsibility for my actions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The scandal began last week when lawmakers in Canada's parliament welcomed the Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelensky.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Following a speech by Zelensky, Anthony Rota singled out 98-year-old Yaroslav Honka, whom he'd invited to sit in the public gallery, describing the man as a Canadian hero.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But over the weekend, it emerged that Honka had been a member of a brutal volunteer unit that was under the command of the Nazis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has called the speaker's invitation deeply embarrassing to Parliament and to all Canadians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A Kosovo court has remanded two alleged gunmen in custody after their arrest last weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It follows a deadly ambush and standoff with police at a monastery near the border with Serbia. A third suspect was detained the day before.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Drone footage of the siege at the monastery has been released by Kosovo's Interior Ministry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The government in Pristina is claiming that the deputy leader of the Spurska List party, which represents many ethnic Serbs in Kosovo, led the group which carried out the weekend attack. Milan Radojcic is said to be closely associated with Serbia's president. Meanwhile, Serbs in northern Kosovo lit candles for the gunmen killed in the clashes with police. A Kosovo police officer also died on Sunday in an ambush before the ensuing gun battle at Banska Monastery.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The clashes are the gravest escalation in violence in Kosovo for years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The suspects were charged with organised smuggling of foreigners for commercial purposes, money laundering and forgery of documents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The network was discovered through the frequency of trips through Frankfurt airport.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: It used several ways of transporting the migrants. Some were taken by plane from Turkey to Luxembourg and then by car to Germany, while others arrived via the Balkan route.
